front.title: Considerations for establishing resolution contexts for Internet Names

abstract.t: The effort to register .onion [RFC7686] in the IANA special names registry[RFC6761] has given rise to considerable discussion of how the namespace associated with the DNS relates to other namespaces used on the Internet. A brief history of this has been set out in [I-D.lewis-domain-names]. This document focuses on the question of how to signal resolution context within a unified namespace that contains both DNS and non-DNS names.
